name: Typing Text
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Want to make your website more interactive? Using this Typing Text plugin for block editor, you can create eye-catching animated typing text in WordPress website.

Easily use this typing text effects inside blog posts or pages & impress your visitors.

‚öôÔ∏è Completely Customizable: You can customize the content, speed, colors, etc to make it suitable for your website design

‚ö° Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Typing Text”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload typing-text to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.2.7 – 12/08/2024

  • Improved: Security Enhancement
  • Few minor bug fixes & improvements

1.2.6 – 04/06/2024

  • Improved: Security Enhancement
  • Few minor bug fixes & improvements

1.2.5 – 15/04/2024

  • Fixed: compatibility support with wordpress 6.5 version
  • Improved: controls

1.2.4 – 29/03/2023

  • Improved: Font loader and Controls

1.2.3 – 23/08/2022

  • Added: Converted style-handler to php for working perfectly with Reusable blocks and FSE
  • Improved: Removed unused dependency

1.2.2 – 06/06/2022

  • Added: Animation, Custom Css and Responsive options
  • Improved: Controls & structure

1.2.1 – 08/02/2022

  • Improved: Controls and structure
  • Added: Added WP 5.9 Version
  • Added: Advanced Tab In Inspector Panel
  • Update: Default View

1.1.3 – 19/08/2021

  • Improved: Security for asset generation

1.1.2 – 11/07/2021

  • Improved: Inspector Panel Design & controls
  • Improved: Responsive Device Preview improved. Now the preview options synced with the wordpress’s default preview button.

1.1.1 – 19/05/2021

  • Hotfix: minor compatibility issue

1.1.0 – 19/05/2021

  • Added: Dynamic asset generation for inline styles
  • Added: Responsive control
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.0.3 – 22/11/2020

  • Fixed prefix space issue

1.0.2 – 09/09/2020

  • Fixed missing js file

1.0.1 – 02/09/2020

  • Fixed font issue

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
